description: React component implementing a navigation bar for the frontend of a note-taking application. Includes UI elements such as the app title, a button to create new notes, and a link to the home page.

methods.name: NavBar
methods.description: React functional component rendering the top navigation bar with app title, description, and a 'New Note' button.

methods.name: onNew
methods.description: Event handler for creating a new note and dispatching a custom event to open its editor.
